posts.post_content:
Joss -- SOLD
Willis -- SOLD
Paypal preferred

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ltsgallery/memberfolderssv/srs1a/mycards//joss_port_PSA4_tn.jpg[/IMG]

I looked for a nice VG/EX example of this card for a long time and I was really happy with this one.  The boys in Parsippany had another opinion.  Joss didn't cross.  There is a small spider wrinkle on the L border a little above his eyes it extends to about the part in his hair.  It is barely visible in the scan.  There are also a couple of spots of color loss in the background -- right above his part and in the UR corner.  These appear to be very small surface abrasions. 

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ltsgallery/memberfolderssv/srs1a/mycards//willis_port_PSA45_tn.jpg[/IMG]

Willis also did not cross.  SGC said the card was trimmed.  I sent the card back to PSA and they said it was fine.  

If interested, please respond to this thread.  thank you

Interested in both 
Please email me [url]bigdan502@yahoo.com[/url] 

Stuck on my phone ill check out the scans when I get home from work

Kudos to this seller for the detailed full disclosure!  I wish you well with your sales.

Cheers,
Blair
Great disclosure.  Wish alot more sellers were this upfront with details.  Good luck on the sale
